Apply Here!


Click on the links below and read the descriptions for each seminar.

Determine which one interests you most, and follow the directions to apply.


Learning Model Seminar
Inspire students to apply the five eternal learning principles of the BYU-Idaho Learning Model.

Academic Planning Seminar
Assist students in understanding how to use the academic resources available at BYU-Idaho in successfully planning their academic path.

Realize the Vision Seminar
Inspire students to realize the prophetic vision of BYU-Idaho as given by our church and institutional leaders.
